name: reishauer-menu
title: Reishauer Menu
description: This Raycast Extension fetches the Reishauer Menu for you.
author: sami_hindi

commands.name: get-menu
commands.title: Get Menu
commands.subtitle: Fetches today's Reishauer Lunch Menu.
commands.description:
This Command returns all the available items on Reishauer's Website for the day.

Price is included as well.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
